name: Doctor Virus
description:
Doctor Virus is a top down shooter created in the Square Jam,  following the "single use" theme, and bringing some dark and horror theme, where you need to enter a hospital to save your daughter in coma, avoiding and killing some monsters with unique weaknesses.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Commands:

WASD - Movement

LMB - Use weapons

E - Interact

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Kaio Barbosa - Game Design

Vinicius - Game Design
